section.name: Download
section.p: The Wicket project is divided into several CVS projects which are built into separate JAR files. These JAR files are available on the download page.
If you are looking for Wicket components for other projects, such as Hibernate, JasperReports, or Velocity, please go to Wicket Stuff.

tr.td: Official reusable components which extend the core.
Examples that demonstrate how to use the core and wicket-extensions
Official Wicket package for kickstarting your web application development using Wicket. Contains its own embedded Jetty server so you don't even have to deploy your application to see it running.
Official Wicket package for integrating your Spring business layer into your Wicket pages in a safe, non-intrusive and consistent way.
Wicket security framework, enabling per-component authorization based on roles, building on top of one of the core Wicket principles: simplicity enabling powerful solutions.
An area for the Wicket team to share experimental code
